catalog_script_client.name: Set payroll on company change

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5b265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbcd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Termination">b7f598d51b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcb9f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0622506f1be0e450e7004229bc4bcb9e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set payroll on company change</name><order>0</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if ( newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	populateDetails(newValue.toString());
}

function populateDetails(newValue) {		
		//set Payroll
		ajax = new GlideAjax('global.get_erp_values'); 
		ajax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'findPayrollByCompanyRefId'); 
		ajax.addParam('val1', newValue.toString());
		ajax.getXML(function(response) { 
			var out = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if(out == null || out == ''){
				g_form.setLabelOf('employee_number', 'Employee Number');
			}
			else{
				g_form.setLabelOf('employee_number', out + ' Employee Number');
			}
			g_form.setValue('payroll_source_system', out);
		}); 

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-06 14:33:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5b265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbcd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set payroll on company change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Termination Process Core" source="c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5b265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbcd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 14:33:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
